document_data.name: Barmar Trull
document_data.mainbody: rmar had dark skin and short black hair. He wore a typical magistrate's robe.
document_data.Description: Barmar had dark skin and short black hair. He wore a typical magistrate's robe.
document_data.History: Around the time of the [[Shadovar invasion of Wheloon]], Barmar and [[Farrain Graymoor]] oversaw the processing of prisoners at the docks of [[Eveningstar]] as they were loaded onto the [[Wheloon Prison boat]].
